text: Qareeb hai kay bijli inn ki aankhen uchak ley jaye jab inn kay liye roshni kerti hai to chaltay phirtay hain aur jab inn per andhera kerti hai to kharay hojatay hain aur agar Allah Taalaa chahaye to inn kay kanon aur aankhon ko bey kaar kerdey. Yaqeenan Allah Taalaa her cheez per qudrat rakhney wala hai
